alert.note: Alert for Karnes; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 12:54PM CST until December 12 at 11:45AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Cibolo Creek at Sutherland Springs affecting Karnes and Wilson Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cibolo Creek at Sutherland Springs. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 21.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:15 PM CST Sunday was 21.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 25.3 feet late this afternoon. It will fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Cibolo Creek Sutherland Spring 21.0 21.9 Sun 12 pm CS 9.7 7.5 7.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM CST.
